attributes.action: We call on HM government not to invoke Article 50 but keep the UK in the EU.

"Young Britons use social media to declare the EU referendum result #NotInMyName" (ABC - Australia)
attributes.background: Given the now-obvious destructive economic and social effect leaving the EU would have, we call on HM government to exercise its right - as the democratically elected representatives of the UK's population - not to invoke Article 50 of the Treaty of Lisbon, but to keep the UK in the European Union.
